dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1852 IH: IHE Nonprofit Clarity Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Biggs of Arizona introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require that any institution of higher education that is a nonprofit organization under section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code be deemed a nonprofit institution of higher education for purposes of such Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the IHE Nonprofit Clarity Act.

section.header: Definition of nonprofit institution of higher education
section.text: Section 103(13) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1003(13)) is amended by inserting at the end the following: Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, in the case of an institution of higher education that is an organization described in section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code and exempt from taxation under section 501(a) of such Code, such institution of higher education shall be deemed to be a nonprofit institution of higher education for purposes of this Act..
